welcome_message_body: Welcome to Portsmouth, a charming coastal city known for its rich maritime history and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore its historic sites, picturesque waterfront, and friendly atmosphere. Enjoy your time in Portsmouth!

restaurants.name: Jax Diner
restaurants.description: Jax Diner is a diner located in Portsmouth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bembridge Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passenger comfort.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Bembridge Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and amenities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi access throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lasham Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
